item.title: Fun with Ruby
item.description: I am lazy and hate using the mouse. So I decided to use ruby to pull my techcrunch news for me. I just started learning ruby so don’t start sending me hate mails if this is too lame for you. Aim screenscrape a webpage and extract some information Gems First we need a way to fetch the webpage. the best one i found was ‘Rest-Client’. it has a very easy interface to get any webpage
